message.body: Lorraine. Tess filled me in on ur lyfe and OMG. How are you dealing with all of this?'v
HOW
EMOTIONAL ROLLER COASTERS
We need to corner off at brunch so I can prepare my series of questions for houtan.

i'm so glad she did. you know i really took it to heart when you said i should have my own experience with kevin, and i totally did, i think that's really good advice generally. when i think back on things now i feel like a baller, not like a fool. i mean, his whole schtick about "i thought it was clear we were just friends" really made him appear foolish to me.
so glad i called kevin out, holy shit.
He was a fool! You ARE a baller.

and with houtan, wow, that was in one sense so shocking but in another sense same as it ever was, you know? i mean he and i have been really close for a long time. in all of this i have completely discarded the kevin thing, i mean day to day i don't think about that weird dude, what i am left with are two things: 1. why did erin forsake me? and 2. where will things with houtan lead? wow so unknown with houtan.
Those are two big take aways from this last month plus. You and houtan are soul mates even if he is so uncouth

when erin told me about houtan i was in a convo with her about feeling good about kevin. it really felt she expressed that to me, while wearing his shirt, to undermine my confidence or something. it was awful.
Ugh!!! Weird power trip you think?
i really do think, lindsey. it was so psychological. i was like woah.
i think she's in a weird place with her cult and her man is a dud.
Lolol. I keep calling it a cult Molly does not like that joke
i get where it comes from now that i am removed from it a bit, but in the moment i didn't understand, and houtan of course never meant for me to know that.
Yeah but Erin should try taking a class in misplaced emotions
Maybe that's what the cult is and it's not working
he talked to me about it. i understand they had a connection. i think that's only natural, i guess yeah, it felt like she disclosed that story to me to undermine me.
and so today i shared my kevin story with houtan
Ugh I'm sorry she was a turd. What's houtans thoughts!?
Also why is houtans biological clock ticking so fast!?

i told him about the two months of intimacy and about how i wished i could have shared it with him while it was happening to get his reading on the situation. i told him it was all over bc kevin is a squirrel man who squirrels around and who wouldn't acknowledge we were in a relationship. houtan said "oh that dude from new years. he seemed like a loser" (LOL)
Lolol.
Of course he thinks that
and then he said, "but to be honest lorraine, I don't want to hear about your guys because, well you know, I only want to hear about them if you're really serious about them and they're really cool."
so there's this off limits topic of conversation with houtan where he never wants to know who i'm dating
but that feels stupid to me
He does not!
He would be so sad!
for instance, I don't know when he's dating anyone
It's the line you know
Crossed the friendship line
and i didn't know he broke up with someone this month!
He had a girlfriend?!
so even when he shared those feelings with erin he was with someone
and had no intention of acting on what he said he just wanted to share his feelings he said they felt like they needed to cone out
you mean yeah he shared feelings bc he wouldn't have to act in the case of erin
That's cause Erin's off limits
You know. Harder to tell someone you have real feelings for things
(Like you)
Yes
He knew that
that's what francesca's theory is about houtan
that he is paralyzed in indecision about making the "perfect choice" about a life partner or something
Knows that.
Yup
That seems true
But he knows it's you
Just like ross and rachel
omg
That is SO weird
You guys gonna live together and have a baby and not be together. Forever.
well i'm glad i called him out on that joke, i was pissed, so disappointed he would joke about that!
do you think houtan really wants to be with me? I can't tell.
we talk every single day pretty much
Actually that sounds perfect
Yeah so inappropriate.
he sends me videos alllllllllllll the time and it's so special
I'm gonna get to the bottom of it
I think he does
i hope you do. he's going to say it's not fair for him to express his feelings to me bc he's not ready to "do what it takes" to make a life with me.
and that asking me to wait is too selfish
It is selfish but it sounds like he's feeling a primal movement
he's one of these A+ students who at age 35 switch to panic mode about having babies
like NOW IS THE TIME- OH NO I'M LATE
and he feels so far behind
Dudes are SLOW
SO SO SLOW
LOL
and i think it feels daunting to him to have to start fresh with a brand new relationship and establish all of the preliminaries before baby making time
whereas with me i think he feels we could get started right away LOLOLOL
George clooney feels the same way
Naw. You find that stuff out fast when your old. He knows you'd be a fierce lawyer mother
And partner
well i appreciate your saying that. i'm in a really good place these days for the first time in a long time and i feel like i'm fielding these roller coasters with grace! how do i feel?
well you know i'm guilty of the same thing as houtan, where i compare everyone i daye to him
and it's not fair but i can't help it
Would you want to have houtans critters?
What about YOU
omg I am always so impressed by your ability to handle ever situation
oh geez, i have been floundering for four years! i'm only now in my prime!
and years ago i thought i would marry houtan
i lived all of 2011 with that idea in my mind

and i wrote to him everyday until he finally said to me that i should stop bc he couldn't move to nyc to be with me and so it wouldn't be fair to me. and i listened to him and spent a long time letting that idea go
I know. But he can't live in Paris forever can he
and he's always behaved so respectfully never blurring the lines of friendship but always making me feel really special
until the ovulation joke
i don't think he'll live in paris. he has been talking about moving to nyc but that's more a longer term possibility
he could make BANK in nyc, so that's enticing, but he doesn't want to give up that quality of life the parisiennes have
anyways, i'm SO RELIEVED tess filled you in and that we had this epic text just now
and i have already told houtan to watch out for ambassador martin's brillo pads. (he said please don't put brillo in his smoothie bc it takes him forever to cut up the fruit)
oh my gawd I was just like WHAT WHAT WHAT when tess was telling me
LOL
i'm so happy you got caught up UGHHHHH
I’m gonna dump yogurt in it
please do
it's probably so good haha
he needs those cultures!
active cultures!
exactly, like hunter's beef is probably acceptable
houtan loves technology
i’m not so sure about that
haha
okay let’s please talk more on Sunday!
tots but he really needs to put some muscles on those legs
he needs to join a sports team
YES
in conjunction with beef or something
exactly
hunter needs to show him what to do
i don’t support beef but frnech beef is probably different
i’l have him make a menu to share with houtan on google drive
bc you need to pack for paris!
ugh I have not even thought about it!
yes let's talk sunday 100%
what kinda jackets!
how many shoes
lindsey, you just need a black pair of pants, one pair of jeans, one dress, and three tops
lol okay. that is what i’m gonna do
you're going to bring one warm jacket
and then the rest is all jewelry and makeup!!!
you're set
Hunter is holding my passport
i’m not allowed
i'll see you sunday!!! HE BETTER HAND IT TO YOU AT THE GATE
OKAY see you soon! have a good hump day
oooof will try!!
